entry.summary: Second callout to the scared hasbeens
entry.content:
This is the second of the mails which i sent to the whole India team.

The gang of hasbeens got visibly enraged after mail 1. A decent last working date was too much to ask for, warnings and notices followed. It did not matter.

Jan 10, 2022, 1:00 PM

Dear All,

I just submitted my resignation. I don’t care if they compensate, or fine me. I am gone from today. Apologies to my colleagues, I waited to make sure I passed the baton to the right set of people, I think you will do well. I am walking out thinking that I have not let you down as a colleague or as a person or what is expected out of a commodity NI(Needs Improvement) rated L6.

I hope that you would find courage to speak when leadership is just playing musical chairs within themselves, while the people who actually do the work wait for a year to get migrated or find better options outside. This is harmful to Gargle, and the country as a whole. This “rebellion” is my expression of solving for a bigger cause than myself - Parity should be restored after this, and you need to leverage this chance to restore culture, logic in this team. I am making sure that this cannot be curbed at a regional level. Do trust internalUselessLink1 - you may end up succeeding like me and believe me - the biggest challenge for me was accepting the reality of it, keeping my sanity at work and personal life. My former buddy knows all about it.

I will speak from a position of strength when you next hear from me. I have better things to do, dealing with goinmul coterie is there, but like at priority 5. It’s Gargle’s fault, not mine to correct.

Keep in touch - linkedin, whatsapp etc are good. TeamBlind.com is excellent.

To my Managers(s) and uselessops team: I want to acknowledge my failure to adhere to PIP since I was rated NI in October 2021.

The last day is 26 April 2022, the same day my second tranche of GSU’s mature. I hope to have no further negotiations or communication on this.

In spirit of accountability, few developments- Bill for CustomerAyurvedaMajor2 Opportunity1 has been raised - 100% confident that you will win this. CustomerDifficult1 is executing an IIOT opportunity with us, this needs holdhanding as its a pure IIOT win with an incumbent partner. PartnerGood1 is all slated to sign up as exclusive or optimal partner for Gargle Cloud’ IIOT practice - across the whole subcontinent. I was able to convince them to model their solution on Gargle Cloud’s IIOT reference architecture - did this in 2 hours - 2/3 meetings. (PartnerGood1 team is a good, considering the low POC cost and their hunger to succeed.) @my NI rating manager and leadership in general - I just gave you the biggest callout of your life. My advise :

Respect InternalSurvey results. Do what you are hired to do - geo strat based deal making should be the best lever. If people are leaving…..linkedin leadership shares - you need to act.

It’s all there in the motto - Dinosaurs etc.

Thanks for the ride and fuelling me with enough contempt to fire for next few years, thought I was burnt out.

Ashish

Ps: To the people who still like me - I am starting a new venture, will keep you posted via linkedin/codeparity.com(its on Gargle Workspace), or just reach out. I am on a quest to define IndianNess - We were and are quite capable of being sustainable. I have it planned like a suspense novel - It would be worth it - some shawshank stuff coming up - all from an underdog who came from nowhere and is absolutely expected to get burned (0% employment probability after this)

Dear manager(s) - This is what i told you about - “Joker” mode : a guy who has a bad day and turns the values of an institution against it, I hope you get it….and yes i have thought through - I “know” this.

Personal message to the leader who likes “imagine dragons” and “pink floyd” - poetic justice coming right up? …. Motorhead Fan

On Googleness - This is the last bit of my duty to Gargle - I will not sue you - someone else may, gears are turning, and it would be beautiful - the hundreds of hours i wasted in explaining and justifying myself - it is going to multiply on you. Time/efficiency is the real currency, not $$$ or account plans.
